name: Ballspell
summary:
Ballspell is a short zuma-like game where you play as a wizard, trying to take down your teachers. Shoot magic at a train of enemies, matching colors to defeat them.

However, be aware, some enemies have special abilities that will complicate things, such as shields that bounce off your magic, or imps that will speed up the train when woken up.

Luckily you learn new spells by defeating your teachers, giving you additional tools in taking them all down!
